user_query: I want to explore the options chain for AAPL with an expiration date of September 16, 2022. Could you fetch that for me? Also, I need to convert 5000 USD to EUR. Can you provide me with the current exchange rate and the converted amount?

TaskList.description: Fetch the options chain for AAPL with an expiration date of September 16, 2022.
Get the current exchange rate for USD to EUR.
Convert 5000 USD to EUR using the fetched exchange rate.
